name: DeskTops test
description: As a user I want to check DeskTops test functionality

children.name: Verify product added to shopping cart successFully
children.description:
productmodelprice
HTC Touch HDProduct 1£74.73
iPhoneproduct 11£75.46
iPod Classicproduct 20£368.73
MacBook AirProduct 17£736.23
Sony VAIOProduct 19£736.23

children.name: Verify product added to shopping cart successFully
Given I am on homepage
When I Mouse hover on Currency Dropdown and click
And I Mouse hover on £Pound Sterling and click
And I Mouse hover on “Desktops” Tab and click
And I Click on “Show AllDesktops”
And I Select Sort By position "Name: A to Z"
And I Select product "HTC Touch HD"
And I Verify the Text "HTC Touch HD"
And I Enter Qty "1” using Select class.
And I Click on “Add to Cart” button
And I Verify the Message “Success: You have added “HTC Touch HD” to your shopping cart!”
And I Click on link “shopping cart” display into success message
And I Verify the Text "Shopping Cart"
And I Verify the Product name "HTC Touch HD"
And I Verify the Model "Product 1"
Then I Verify the Total "£74.73"
Verify product added to shopping cart successFully

name: Top menu test
description: As a user I want to check Top menu functionality

children.name: Verify user should navigate to laptops and notebooks page successfully
Given I am on homepage
When I Mouse hover on “Laptops & Notebooks” Tab and click
And I call selectMenu method and pass the menu = “Show All Laptops & Notebooks”
Then I Verify the text ‘Laptops & Notebooks'
